comments.en:
Tim Engler's Lexmark 1100 driver, released March 2000. Tim does not continue the development any more, someone overtaking the project is welcome. The original web site, http://www.burntcouch.com/lexmark/ is not available anymore, but the driver can be downloaded here from linuxprinting.org

Important: If you use gcc 3.1 or later for compiling this driver you should apply a little correction by running the command

perl -p -i -e "s/friend Lexmark/friend class Lexmark/" *.h

in the source directory of the driver before you compile the driver with the "make" command.

To use gcc 3.4 or later, you need to apply this patch.
It might work with this 1000/1100 driver? Someone try and let me know.
